name: out of controls (sammie)
description:
made for the gmtk gamejam 2020: out of control

this is a short puzzle game in which you slowly run out of controls! a level is only completed once you have no more controls left, so you have to use them wisely to win the game!

controls:

  • movement = arrow keys
  • reset = enter
  • escape = go back to the menu

get the soundtrack on bandcamp!

everything made by us within the timeframe of the jam (except for a few grass tiles)
